original_text: You should say clearly to other people, “I believe in Jesus.” If you do that, I will say to my Father in heaven, “This is someone who is my disciple.”
korean_text: 누구든지 사람 앞에서 나를 시인하면 나도 하늘에 계신 내 아버지 앞에서 그를 시인할 것이요

sentences.original_text: You should say clearly to other people
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 다른 사람들에게 분명히 말해야 한다

sentences.original_text: I will say to my Father in heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 하늘에 계신 내 아버지께 말할 것이다

sentences.original_text: "This is someone who is my disciple."
